name: d-flector-1
description:
This is a game of space survival. Shield the Universe from, the projectiles of enemy. In the start there is a tutorial section. The game is easy to understand you need a mouse and skills. Your goal is to achieve all the medals and complete all levels. To pause the game press ESC key.

We have tried a new Logo (Levithan) but we will change it in future as it is not that great 

Created By : Vector Falcon Games

Enjoy!!
